Verses: 1 karththar Moseyaiyum Aaronaiyum Nokki:
2 leviyin Puththirarukkulle Irukkira Kokaadh Puththirarudaiya Pidhaakkalin Veettu Vamsangalil,
3 aasarippuk Koodaaraththile Velaiseyyum Senaikku Utpadaththakka Muppadhu Vayadhumudhal Aimbadhu Vayadhuvaraikkumulla Ellaaraiyum Enni, Thogaiyiduvaayaaga.
4 aasarippuk Koodaaraththile Kokaadh Puththirarin Panividai Magaa Parisuththamaanavaigalukkuriyadhu.
5 paalayam Purappadumpodhu, Aaronum Avan Kumaararum Vandhu, Maraivin Thiraichcheelaiyai Irakki, Adhinaale Saatchiyin Pettiyai Moodi,
6 adhinmel Thagasuththol Moodiyaippottu, Adhinmel Mutrilum Neelamaana Thuppattiyai Viriththu, Adhin Thandugalaip Paaichchi,

7 samugaththappa Mejaiyinmel Neelath Thuppattiyai Viriththu, Thattugalaiyum Thoobakkarandigalaiyum Kinnangalaiyum Moodugira Thattugalaiyum Adhinmel Vaippaargalaaga; Niththiya Appamum Adhinmel Irukkakkadavadhu.
8 avaigalinmel Avargal Sivapputh Thuppattiyai Viriththu, Adhaith Thagasuththol Moodiyaal Moodi, Adhin Thandugalaip Paaichchi,
9 ilaneelath Thuppattiyai Eduththu, Kuththuvilakkuththandaiyum, Adhin Agalgalaiyum, Adhin Kaththarigalaiyum, Saambal Paaththirangalaiyum, Adharkuriya Enneyp Paaththirangalaiyum Moodi,
10 adhaiyum Adharkaduththa Thattumuttugal Yaavaiyum Thagasuththol Moodikkulle Pottu, Adhai Oru Thandile Katti,
11 porpeedaththinmel Ilaneelath Thuppattiyai Viriththu, Adhaith Thagasuththol Moodiyaal Moodi, Adhin Thandugalaip Paaichchi,
12 parisuththa Sthalaththil Vazhangum Aaraadhanaikketra Sagala Thattumuttugalaiyum Eduththu, Ilaneelath Thuppattiyile Pottu, Thagasuththol Moodiyinaal Moodi, Thandinmel Katti,
13 palipeedaththai Saambalara Vilakki, Adhinmel Raththaambarath Thuppattiyai Viriththu,

14 adhinmel Aaraadhanaikketra Sagala Panimuttugalaagiya Kalasangalaiyum, Multhuradugalaiyum, Saambal Edukkum Karandigalaiyum, Kalasangalaiyum, Palipeedaththirkaduththa Ellaap Paaththirangalaiyum, Adhinmel Vaiththu, Adhinmel Thagasuththol Moodiyai Viriththu, Adhin Thandugalaip Paaichchakkadavargal.

15 paalayam Purappadumpodhu, Aaronum Avan Kumaararum Parisuththa Sthalaththaiyum Adhinudaiya Sagala Panimuttugalaiyum Moodith Theerndhapinbu, Kokaadh Puththirar Adhai Eduththukkondupogiradharku Varakkadavargal; Avargal Saagaadhapadikkup Parisuththamaanadhaith Thodaadhirukkakkadavargal; Aasarippuk Koodaaraththile Kokaadh Puththirar Sumakkum Sumai Idhuve.

16 aasaariyanaagiya Aaronin Kumaaran Eleyaasaar, Vilakkukku Enneyaiyum, Sugandha Thoobavarkkaththaiyum, Dhinandhorum Idum Pojanapaliyaiyum, Abishega Thailaththaiyum, Vaasasthalam Muzhuvadhaiyum, Adhilulla Yaavaiyum, Parisuththa Sthalaththaiyum Adhin Panimuttugalaiyum, Visaarikkakkadavan Endraar.
17 karththar Moseyaiyum Aaronaiyum Nokki:
18 leviyarukkulle Kokaadh Vamsamaagiya Koththiraththaar Azhindhupogaadhapadi Paarungal.
19 avargal Magaa Parisuththamaanavaigalaik Kittugaiyil, Saagaamal Uyirodirukkumpadikku, Neengal Avargalukkaaga Seyyavendiyadhaavadhu:

20 aaronum Avan Kumaararum Vandhu, Avargalil Avanavanai Avanavan Seyyum Velaikkum Avanavan Sumakkum Sumaikkum Niyamikkakkadavargal; Avargalo Saagaadhapadikkup Parisuththamaanavaigal Moodappadumpodhu Paarkkiradharku Utpravesiyaamal Iruppaargalaaga Endraar.
21 pinnum, Karththar Moseyai Nokki:
22 kerson Puththirarudaiya Pidhaakkalin Veettu Vamsangalilum Aasarippuk Koodaaraththile Panividai Velaiseyyum Senaikku Utpadaththakka,
23 muppadhu Vayadhumudhal Aimbadhu Vayadhuvaraikkumulla Ellaaraiyum Enni, Thogai Etruvaayaaga.
24 panividai Seygiradhilum Sumakkiradhilum Kerson Vamsaththaarin Velaiyaavadhu:
25 avargal Vaasasthalaththukkum Aasarippuk Koodaaraththukkum Uriya Thonguthiraiyaiyum, Moodiyaiyum, Avaigalinmel Irukkira Thagasuththol Moodiyaiyum, Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasal Maraivaiyum,

26 praagaaraththin Thonguthiraigalaiyum, Vaasasthalaththandaiyilum Palipeedaththandaiyilum Sutrilum Irukkira Praagaaraththinudaiya Vaasal Thonguthiraiyaiyum, Avaigalin Kayirugalaiyum, Avaigalin Velaikkaduththa Karuvigal Yaavaiyum Sumandhu, Avaigalukkaaga Seyyavendiya Yaavaiyum Seyyakkadavargal.

27 kerson Puththirar Sumakkavendiya Sumaigalum Seyyavendiya Panividaigalaagiya Sagala Velaigalum Aaronum Avan Kumaararum Sollugirapadiye Seyyavendum, Avargal Sumakkavendiya Sagala Sumaigalaiyum Neengal Niyamiththu, Avargalidaththil Oppuviyungal.
28 kerson Puththirarin Vamsaththaar Aasarippuk Koodaaraththile Seyyum Panividai Idhudhaan; Avargalai Velaikollum Visaaranai, Aasaariyanaagiya Aaronin Kumaaran Iththaamaarudaiya Kaikkul Irukkavendum.
29 meraari Puththirarudaiya Pidhaakkalin Veettu Vamsangalilum Aasarippuk Koodaaraththile Panividai Velaiseyyum Senaikku Utpadaththakka,
30 muppadhu Vayadhumudhal Aimbadhu Vayadhuvaraikkumulla Ellaaraiyum Ennakkadavaai.
31 aasarippuk Koodaaraththil Avargal Seyyum Ellaap Panividaikkum Aduththa Kaaval Visaarippaavadhu: Vaasasthalaththin Palagaigalum, Thaazhppaalgalum, Thoongalum, Paadhangalum,

32 sutrilum Irukkira Praagaaraththin Thoongalum, Avaigalin Paadhangalum, Mulaigalum, Kayirugalum, Avaigalin Sagala Karuvigalum, Avatrirku Aduththa Matrellaa Velaiyumdhaane; Avargal Sumandhu Kaavalkaakkumpadi Oppuvikkappadugiravaigalaip Perperaaga Ennakkadaveergal.
33 aasaariyanaagiya Aaronudaiya Kumaaranaana Iththaamaarudaiya Kaikkullaaga Meraari Puththirarin Vamsaththaarar Aasarippuk Koodaaraththile Seyyum Panividaikku Aduththa Ellaa Velaiyum Idhuve Endraar.
34 appadiye Moseyum Aaronum Sabaiyin Prabukkalum Kokaadh Puththirarudaiya Pidhaakkalin Veettu Vamsangalinpadi Aasarippuk Koodaaraththile Panividai Seyyum Senaikku Utpadaththakka,
35 muppadhu Vayadhumudhal Aimbadhu Vayadhuvaraikkumulla Ellaaraiyum Enninaargal.
36 avargal Vamsangalil Ennappattavargal Irandaayiraththu Ezhunootru Aimbadhuper.
37 karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye, Moseyinaalum Aaronaalum Kokaadh Vamsaththaaril Aasarippuk Koodaaraththil Velai Seygiradharkaaga, Ennith Thogaiyidappattavargal Ellaarum Ivargale.
38 kerson Puththirarudaiya Pidhaakkalin Veettu Vamsangalilum Aasarippuk Koodaaraththile Panividai Seyyum Senaikku Utpadaththakka,
39 muppadhu Vayadhumudhal Aimbadhu Vayadhuvaraikkumulla Ellaarum Ennappattaargal.
40 avargalil Ennappattavargal Avaravar Kudumbaththinpadikkum, Pidhaakkaludaiya Vamsaththinpadikkum Irandaayiraththu Arunootru Muppadhuper.
41 moseyinaalum Aaronaalum Karththar Kattalaiyittapadiye Kerson Puththirarin Vamsaththaaril Aasarippuk Koodaaraththil Velaiseyya Ennith Thogaiyidappattavargal Ellaarum Ivargale.
42 meraari Puththirarudaiya Pidhaakkalin Veettu Vamsangalilum Aasarippuk Koodaaraththile Panividai Seyyum Senaikku Utpadaththakka,
43 muppadhu Vayadhumudhal Aimbadhu Vayadhullavargal Ellaarum Ennappattaargal.
44 avargalil Ennappattavargal Thangal Kudumbangalinpadiye Moovaayiraththu Irunooruper.
45 karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye Moseyinaalum Aaronaalum Meraari Puththirarin Kudumbaththaaril Ennith Thogaiyidappattavargal Ellaarum Ivargale.

46 leviyarudaiya Pidhaakkalin Veettu Vamsangalil Muppadhu Vayadhumudhal Aimbadhu Vayadhuvaraikkumullavargal Aasarippuk Koodaaraththile Seyyum Panividaivelaikkum Sumaiyin Velaikkum Utpadaththakkavargalum,
47 moseyinaalum Aaronaalum Isravelin Prabukkalaalum Ennappattavargalum Aagiya Ellaarum,
48 ennaayiraththu Ainnootru Enbadhuperaayirundhaargal.

49 karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye, Avargal Thangal Thangal Panividaikkendrum Thangal Thangal Sumaikkendrum Moseyinaal Ennappattaargal; Ivvidhamaai, Karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye Avargal Avanaal Ennappattaargal.
